Package DesktopScheduler

Class AllAppointmentScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • DesktopScheduler.AllAppointmentScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class AllAppointmentScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is the controller of the all appointment screen used to add functionality to the all appointment screen. In this class all appointments in the database may be viewed, updated, and/or deleted.
    Version:
    Version 1.0
    Author:
    Kyle Matinzi

      • overLapTest

        public static boolean overLapTest​(java.time.LocalDateTime proposedStartDateTime,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime proposedEndDateTime,
                                  int appointmentCustomerId,
                                  int appointmentId)
        This method checks to see if a new appointment overlaps with an existing appointment for a given customer ID.
        Parameters:
        proposedStartDateTime - - appointment start time
        proposedEndDateTime - - appointment end time
        appointmentCustomerId - - customer ID
        Returns:
        - true if there is an overlap, false if there is no overlap.

      • timeCheck

        public static boolean timeCheck​(java.time.LocalTime startTime,
                                java.time.LocalTime endTime)
        This method checks user entry to make sure that the start time is not after or equal to the end time.
        Parameters:
        startTime - - inputted start time
        endTime - - inputted end time
        Returns:
        - true if times are equal or start is after end, false if they are not equal and start is before end.
